Name: 御剑飞行射击训练空间
About the game: Playing 'Yujian flying shooting training space' will take you to experience the happiness of Yujian flying. Here, you will become a cultivator. There are many modes of flying and holding your sword! Novice training camp, training straight-line flight, mastering basic flying skills! Flying clearance mode, avoid obstacles in curved terrain and fly at full speed. It's time to test your flying ability! Shooting tower running mode, here you will begin to train your flying shooting ability, shooting at moving objects, which is the basis of actual combat ability! Guard mode, use the flying shooting ability of the imperial sword you learned earlier to participate in the actual battle of defending the fairy world, release skills, and destroy incoming enemies! Infinite mode, where you will fly to evade the enemy's attack while flying to attack the enemy, infinite training, and further strengthen your actual combat ability! At the same time, you can also buy pills to improve your accomplishments. The higher your accomplishments, the longer your flight time and the stronger your strength!
